segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor now, it's really becoming a problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong, it's frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be really focused on those dishes to not notice the puddle at her feet, it's right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is almost falling off that stool, but he's determined to get those cookies no matter what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl is cheering him on, her hand still outstretched and waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before when the woman wasn't looking, they seem pretty comfortable with the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is really going to be a mess if someone doesn't do something soon, it's getting out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really pay more attention to what's going on around her, she's missing a lot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk standing on that stool like that, he could seriously get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hurt himself trying to get those cookies, it's not worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and calm, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
